title: How to Build an Accordion-Menu using CSS and a bit of jQuery
abstract: We're doing a project these days where we use an accordion-menu to show some content. I want to share with you how I did this using jQuery and CSS. This is pretty easy and I want to encourage you not to use any plugin or so but to write the code yourself and learn a bit more about how to use CSS and jQuery and save some microseconds on your loading type. The HTML This is kinda straightforward I think. We don't need a wrapper for the accordion-menu.
